review.title: “Employees are good, I just wish the owner knew it”
review.pros: Pros – You are not micromanaged. Going home at the end of your shift.
review.cons: Cons – No raises, no bonus, no retirement plan, and not enough vacation time. Everytime someone leaves or is fired, they are not replaced. Their job just becomes your job without so much as a thank you.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Learn how to appreciate the good employees that you have.
